about_the_game:
Have you ever dream to sit in your isolated room and contemplate your broken mind? Yeah... This game won't help you cure it.

This is a simulation of how bad a person reacts to isolation. It may be scary, it contains horror elements, but the point is to experience a mind going wild in the isolated space.
This is only a prototype, not a full vertical slice of a game. The whole thing should take you no more than 20 minutes, you may experience weird noises, anxiety and mirages.

And one thing more, the experience can be different for each individual. Do not panic.
If you feel dizzy or you experience rising heartbeat, please turn off this game by simple tapping Escape button.

content_descriptors.notes: It's a horror, it can be scary, expect flickering light, monsters, maybe jump-scares and creepy voices.
